701938f-a.title: Bronx: University Avenue - 175th Street (West)
701938f-a.text:
University Ave., east side, north from West 175th Street.
About 1914.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

701940f-a.title: Bronx: University Avenue - 175th Street (West)
701940f-a.text:
University Ave., west side, between West 175th and West 176 Streets,
showing the grove of ancient American Elms at the entrance to the R.W.
Montgomery estate. The Montgomery mansion was located on what is now
the West side of Montgomery Ave., between the aforementioned streets. Two
6-story apartment houses now (1938) occupy the location shown in the view.
About 1922.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

700414f-a.title: Bronx: Andrews Avenue South - 175th Street (West)
700414f-a.text:
Andrews Ave. South, west side, between West 175th and West 176th
Streets, showing two 3-unit apartment houses. The view is in a northerly
direction.
About 1928.
Knickerbocker Photo Service.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
